column3: `Bytes Send: 1MB` seems still logical to me (Megabytes are also bytes).\nI personally like the "Bytes" in front of Send and Receive because it will quickly allow one to identify that it is related to "traffic".\n

> use "Sent" and "Received" (rather than "Data Sent" and "Data Received") because we already have translations for the former.

Still, I'd prefer "Data *" or just keep "Bytes *" because you can also send packets or messages or...
I'm ok with this change, "bytes" is indeed redundant, the unit speaks for itself.\nACK\n
